title: Self-cycled photocatalytic Fenton system and rapid degradation of organic pollutants over magnetic 3D MnS nanosheet/iron-nickel foam
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00452C, Paper
Xiaoqian Ma, Yu Liu, Yi Zhao, Xiaohong Chen, Junyang Leng, Anlong Zhang, Daomei Chen, Kai Xiong, Jiaqiang Wang
The photocatalysis self-Fenton systems by coupling photocatalysis and Fenton technology overcome the limitations of conventional Fenton reactions by in-situ generation and activation of H2O2. While a considerable amount of iron...
